summary: Adds simple fur armor with unique look for new adventurers
descriptionHtml:
Name: Fur Iron Plated Armor
Version: 2.1
Date: 4/5/2012
Category: Weapons and Armor
Author(s): TheZereth

To-do
==========
Adding hip protection (Nearly done)
Custom Textures

Description
===========
I liked the fur armor in skyrim but it has always been lacking, so i created this armor a unique looking fur armor to use at start of the adventure to mid level

Location
========
Can be crafted at forge and improved at workbench
or in Alvor\'s house in Riverwood, downstairs, in barrel

Details
=======
Fur armor with Iron, alongside a fur hood to complete the look.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.



Upgrade
=======

Example #2 (no ill affects on savegames):
1. Uninstall the old mod.
2. Install the new mod.
3. Start skyrim and play. There is no effect on saved games and cannot 
corrupt any saves.

Incompatibility
===============
none what-so ever

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
none at the moment

History
=======
1.0 5.4.2012 Initial Release 
1.1 5.4.2012 fur hood fix
2.0 5.4.2012 female version and clipping issues fixed
2.1 6.4.2012 beast race support and can now be crafted (thanks to LazyAltmer for pointing that out)

Contact
=======

You can find me on TESNexus as \'TheZereth\'
You can send me an email here: zereth2012@gmail.com


Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
TES Creation Kit  
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
author: TheZereth
